dct_title_s: Map of the Perth Amboy Shore of Staten Island Sound from Fayette Street to Buckingham Avenue Locating the existing Pierhead and Bulkhead Lines with reference to High Street
dct_description_sm: Map labels the various companies located along the waters edge including Raritan Dry Dock Co., Perth Amboy Dry Dock Co., Standard Oil Co., Merritt's Wharf, and Raritan Mercantile Co.
Map was traced from blueprint Sep. 27, 1917 by H.R. Tooker.
